properties.entry: INSERT INTO PRODUCT ( PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, STOCK, DELIVERY_DATE, SALE, PRODUCT_THUMBNAIL, PRODUCT_IMG, PRODUCT_CONTENT, MEMBERS_NO, PRODUCT_DELIVERY_PRICE, PRODUCT_CATEGORY ) VALUES( SEQ_PDID.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
